author: grisemetamoonverse
title: Clash royale & starcraft mixed game
description: We plan on designing a game on cardano that is a mixture of starcaft and clash royale. With focus on it being Highly addictive.
solution: Create a game that has 3 races, and each race has 4-6 characters (initially). Goal would be to give these characters special properties.
experience: We have been developing in the blockchain space for the past 8 months. We have a big team and have delivered quite a few milestones.
